name: Tyranny of the Labyrinth
description: Tyranny of the Labyrinth is a combat-focused roguelike where your actions change the dungeon's denizens. Inspired by Path of Exile's Incursion league, defeating any of the Labyrinth's four Tyrants allows you to take a portion of their power, but makes the remaining creatures that much more dangerous. Defeating the last Tyrant gives you sole control of the labyrinth, and unlocks that Tyrant's class for future playthroughs!
